```{r}
df = read.csv("chicos.csv", stringsAsFactors = F)
```
```{r}
indices = (
  ! is.na(df$WEIGHT) &
  ! is.na(df$STATURE) &
  ! is.na(df$SEX) &
  ! is.na(df$RACE) &
  ! is.na(df$AGE.IN.YEARS) &
  ! is.na(df$AGE.IN.MONTHS) &
  df$WEIGHT>0 &
  df$STATURE>0 &
  df$RACE != 0 &
  (df$SEX == 1 | df$SEX==2)
    )
dfFiltrados = df[indices,]
```
```{r}
unique(df$SEX)
```
```{r}
dfFiltrados$AGE.IN.YEARS
```

range(dfFiltrados$AGE.IN.MONTHS)
